overview: A collage of footage foraging the flavorful moments of gastronomical scape â€“ a cooked film instead of a cooking show. The camera is not the observer of a dinner, but a participant that has its own unique sensory system for savoring time. The film is a pot in where boundaries between ingredients and materials, food and utensils are dissolved, mingled each other and showing the materiality of taste.
title: The Scent of Time
